name: Paneer Butter Masala

name: Veg Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and fragrant spices.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato masala served with chutney and sambar.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas curry served with fluffy fried bhature.

name: Veg Momos
description: Steamed dumplings stuffed with spiced vegetables served with red chutney.

description: Crispy fried rolls stuffed with spiced vegetables.

description: Red kidney beans curry served with steamed basmati rice.

name: Aloo Paratha
